item.title: Building an Azure lab environment via ARM templates - Part3 Saving Money with Auto Shutdown
item.description: Aim This post will show you how to take your existing template and add a special resource to it which is a “Schedules” resource which shuts down your VM at a specified time to save you money. Pre-reqs You’ll need: Read/do Part 1 (https://www.chrisneale.org/Azure-Lab-via-Templates-Part1/) Read/do Part 2 (https://www.chrisneale.org/Azure-Lab-via-Templates-Part2/) Be a really quick catcher upper The Story so far and next So you have an ARM template in your library. It deployed a vNet a NIC and a VM (with a managed disk).
